title: Saving Angelo
text:
Saving Angelo is a 2007 <a href="Dominic%20Scott%20Kay">Dominic Scott Kay</a>-directed short film based on the true events of a white <a href="Boxer%20%28dog%29">boxer</a> that he and his family rescued in 2003. All promotions and earnings wents to animal charity projects.
In January 2007, Kay filed a lawsuit claiming that producer Conroy Kanter "unfairly demanded creative control and distribution rights" for the film. The suit was settled out of court with Kay receiving "full ownership and control" of the film, along with a $20,000 donation to <a href="Crusades%20for%20Animals">Crusades for Animals</a>.
